text: Maurice Beatson (born 27 August 1953) is a New Zealand equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of New Zealand Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hastings, New Zealand
title: Maurice Beatson
